oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Steve Evans interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Evans, Stephen; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Col. Stephen C. Evans served in the U. S. Army, Artillery as a forward observer with First Field Force Vietnam for six months and was reassigned to The Military Assistance Command Vietnam, (MAC-V), for the last six months. He served from July 1968 to July 1969. He retired from the Army Reserve 31 July 1997 after 30 years of service.
